scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && tsc && test -f .env && cp .env dist/.env || echo 'No .env file, skipping copy'
scripts.package:pi: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-arm64 --output bin/hackernews-insights-linux-arm64
scripts.package:x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output bin/hackernews-insights-linux-x64
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output bin/hackernews-insights-macos-arm64
scripts.package:all: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-arm64,node18-linux-x64 --out-path bin
scripts.prisma:deploy: prisma migrate deploy || prisma db push
